#Text=Practice Being a Vet at a Young Age
#Text=Do you want to be a vet some day ?
#Text=If you 're still a child but you have ambitions to become a vet , you can prepare yourself from a young age for tending to animals by doing basic animal care at home .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Practicing on your pet
#Text=Practice on your pet .
#Text=Observe your pet daily , and keep an eye out for any signs of bad health or deterioration in well-being .
#Text=For example , if you have a dog and it 's eating grass , it may be sick .
#Text=On the other hand , this could be a sign of something a healthy dog does , so always do your research in reliable books about animal care .
#Text=Give your pet a weekly checkup .

#Text=Check its ears , heartbeat , eyes , etc. Talk to your pet 's real vet about the things to look for , and let your vet know about your ambitions and how you 're trying to get ready for this role later in life .
#Text=Be responsible .
#Text=Feed your pet , give it water , and know what amounts of food are good for it .
#Text=Learn about the nutritional balance that is good for your pet and check that it is getting this in the foods you feed to it .
#Text=Love your pet .
#Text=Spend time with your pet , talking to it , grooming it and playing with it .
#Text=Knowing all that you can about animals will set you in good stead if you decide to one day go to college to become a veterinarian .
#Text=Practicing on your stuffed animals
#Text=Practice on stuffed animals .
#Text=Imagine a stuffed animal is a real one and there is something wrong with it .
#Text=Make up a vet surgery for it and bring the stuffed animal along for a checkup and diagnosis .
#Text=General learning about animals
#Text=Look at vet websites .
#Text=There are thousands of vet websites with information on health for all animals .
#Text=Volunteer at an animal shelter .
#Text=When you are old enough to do this , it is a great way to learn all that you can about caring for animals .
#Text=Becoming a vet , vet nurse or other animal related carer
#Text=Do well in school .
#Text=In order to be a vet or a vet 's assistant , get straight A 's , so that you can get into the course of your choice .
#Text=be sure to choose the right subjects too – – ask your teacher for help in finding out which subjects are best to focus on .

#Text=Other ways to help animals is to become a zookeeper , a shelter carer , an animal rescuer , a fundraiser for endangered species , a worker with an NGO for animals , a wildlife photographer , a nature journalist , and so forth .
#Text=Think of all the possible ways you can work with animals and choose the career that seems best suited to you .
#Text=Keep working towards your goal .
#Text=Animals are plentiful around the world and need caring people like you to ensure their health and well-being is properly taken care of .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do not give your pet medicine unless told to .
